metadata.name: elemental magic
metadata.description:
The water elemental is commonly referred to as the mermaid. have the ability to create visual and sound illusions, leading the soul of a person in time streams, feeding on the emotions of the victim.

I present to you
 attention of the spirit of the dead lake. the last of its kind on the lands of the middle world, its peculiarity is that it manifests itself both in physics and on the astral layer of the world. The creature's consciousness is very unusual, it has two organs of perception more than a human.

this spirit is attached to the picture by a seal with the help of a ritual. you have a unique opportunity to become the owner of a living picture in the literal sense.
